thread.section_title: Citadines South Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel
thread.title_full: Nice hotel - Review of Citadines South Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kate M
title: Nice hotel
text:
A nice, clean, modern hotel. Staff very helpful, amenities good. Great location - just a 5 minute walk to Gloucester Rd tube, close to a Waitrose, wine shops and nice pubs and restaurants. The room and bathroom were a decent size, toilet separate from bathroom.
They don't do breakfasts but there are places just around the corner which are open early.
